FontString.name: $parentTitleString
FontString.text: Feral Skills Settings

FontString.name: $parentLabel
FontString.text: Create Maul+ / Claw+ / Shred+ / Shift+ Macros

FontString.name: $parentLabel
FontString.text: Welcome to FeralSkills. FeralSkills provides functions which use your feral skills based on the situation, and the customizations you make in this dialog. To use these functions, you may use keybindings (via the standard keybindings dialog), or click the below buttons to create macros to active them.

FontString.name: $parentLabel
FontString.text: Create Individual Shapeshifting Macros

FontString.name: $parentLabel
FontString.text: Character Specific

FontString.name: $parentLabel
FontString.text: Don't target nearest mob when target is dead or you have no target.

FontString.name: $parentLabel
FontString.text: Track Immunities - Watches for 'Immune' messages, and won't use that skill on that mob anymore.

FontString.name: $parentLabel
FontString.text: Reset Immunity Tracking Cache - Use this if incorrect immunities are detected.

FontString.name: $parentLabel
FontString.text: Bear Form
